Name: LU 423 - Zoning, Broadway/Sherman Avenue, Manhattan (N 160164 ZRM)
Title: Resolution disapproving the decision of the City Planning Commission on Application No. N 160164 ZRM, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, to establish a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area in Community District 12, Borough of Manhattan (L.U. No. 423).

History.Description: This Resolution was Disapproved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Disapproved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

Attachments.Name: Land Use Calendar - Week of July 11, 2016 - July 15, 2016
Land Use Calendar - Week of August 8, 2016 - August 12, 2016
August 16, 2016 - Stated Meeting Agenda with Links to Files
Minutes of the Stated Meeting - August 16, 2016

RTF:
{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fmodern\fprq1\fcharset162{\*\fname Courier New;}Courier New TUR;}}
\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
By Council Members Greenfield and Richards\b0\par
\par
      \tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on June 27, 2016 its decision dated June 22, 2016 (the "Decision"), pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, regarding an application submitted by Arcadia Sherman Avenue, LLC, for an amendment of the text of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, to establish a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area which in conjunction with the related Zoning Map amendment would facilitate construction of a new mixed-use building at 4650 Broadway, located in Inwood section of Manhattan within Community District 12, (Application No. N 160164 ZRM), Community District 12, Borough of Manhattan (the "Application");\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Application is related to application C 150438 ZMM (L.U. No. 422), an amendment to the Zoning Map to rezone property from R7-2/C2-4 to R9A/C2-4 and R8X/C2-4;\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\sa240\qj      \tab WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(1) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj       \tab WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on July 12, 2016;\par
\par
      \tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the revised negative declaration (CEQR No. 16DCP072M) issued on June 20, 2016, which \f1\par
\f0 includes an (E) Designation (E-374) related to hazardous materials and noise to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts (the \ldblquote Revised Negative Declaration\rdblquote );\par
\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Revised Negative Declaration.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, N 160164 ZRM, incorporated by reference herein, the Council disapproves the Decision.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\sa240\qj Adopted.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj       \tab The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx1440\tab I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on August 16, 2016, on file in this office.\par
